009
010package More_;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import java.awt.Color;
015import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
016import java.util.Arrays;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.gui.Roi;
022import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
023import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
024import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptor;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptorTrigonometric;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
032import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
033import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
034
035/**
036 * <p>
037 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the "trigonometric" construction of elliptic Fourier descriptors. See Sec. 26.3.7 of
038 * [1] for details. The input is a user-defined polygon selection (ROI). The number of Fourier coefficient pairs can be
039 * specified in the user dialog. The plugin then displays the original polygon and the approximate contour
040 * reconstruction from the Fourier descriptor using all specified coefficient pairs. Increasing the number of
041 * coefficient pairs improves the reconstruction.
042 * </p>
043 * <p>
044 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction Using Java</em>, 2nd ed,
045 * Springer (2016).
046 * </p>
047 *
048 * @author WB
049 * @version 2022/10/28
050 */
051public class Fourier_Descriptor_Trigonometic implements PlugInFilter {
052        
053        private static int FourierCoefficientPairs = 3;
054        
055        // visualization-related settings
056        private static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
057        private static boolean ShowFullReconstruction = true;
058        private static int ReconstructionPoints = 100;
059        
060        private static Color ContourColor = new Color(0, 60, 255);
061        private static double ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
062        private static Color ReconstructionColor = new Color(0, 185, 15);
063        private static double ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5;
064        
065        private ImagePlus im;
066        
067        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
068        
069        /**
070         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
071         * is currently open.
072         */
073        public Fourier_Descriptor_Trigonometic() {
074                if (noCurrentImage()) {
075                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.HouseRoi);
076                }
077        }
078        
079        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
080        
081        @Override
082        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
083        this.im = im;
084        return DOES_ALL + ROI_REQUIRED + NO_CHANGES;
085        }
086        
087        @Override
088        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
089                
090                if (!runDialog()) {
091                        return;
092                }
093                
094                Roi anyRoi = im.getRoi();
095                Pnt2d[] V = RoiUtils.getOutlinePointsFloat(anyRoi); // toPointArray(anyRoi);
096                IJ.log("V=" + Arrays.toString(V));
097                FourierDescriptor fd = FourierDescriptorTrigonometric.from(V, FourierCoefficientPairs);
098
099                Complex ctr = fd.getCoefficient(0);
100                
101                ImagePlus imA = makeBackgroundImage();
102                imA.show();
103                
104                ColoredStroke contourStroke = new ColoredStroke(ContourStrokeWidth, ContourColor);
105                ColoredStroke reconstructionStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth, ReconstructionColor);
106                
107                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
108                
109                if (ShowOriginalContour) {
110                        ola.addShape(toClosedPath(V), contourStroke);
111                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(ctr.re, ctr.im).getShape());
112                }
113                
114                if (true) {
115                        for (Pnt2d v : V) {
116                                ola.addShape(v.getShape(3), contourStroke);
117                        }
118                }
119
120                if (ShowFullReconstruction) { // draw the shape reconstructed from all FD-pairs
121                        Path2D rec = FourierDescriptor.toPath(fd.getShapeFull(ReconstructionPoints));
122                        ola.addShape(rec, reconstructionStroke);
123                }
124
125                imA.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
126                imA.updateAndDraw();
127                                
128        }
129
130        // -------------------------------------------------------------
131        
132        private ImagePlus makeBackgroundImage() {
133                ByteProcessor bp = im.getProcessor().convertToByteProcessor();
134                String title = String.format("%s-partial-%03d", im.getShortTitle(), FourierCoefficientPairs);
135                
136                if (bp.isInvertedLut()) {
137                        bp.invert();
138                        bp.invertLut();
139                }
140                brighten(bp, 220);      
141                return new ImagePlus(title, bp);
142        }
143        
144        private Path2D toClosedPath(Pnt2d[] pnts) {
145                Path2D path = new Path2D.Float();
146                path.moveTo(pnts[0].getX(), pnts[0].getY());
147                for (int i = 1; i < pnts.length; i++) {
148                        path.lineTo(pnts[i].getX(), pnts[i].getY());
149                }
150                path.closePath();
151                return path;
152        }
153        
154        private void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
155                 float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
156                 int[] table = new int[256];
157                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
158                         table[i] = Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
159                         
160                 }
161                 ip.applyTable(table);
162        }
163        
164        // -------------------------------------------------------------
165        
166        private boolean runDialog() {
167                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
168                gd.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", FourierCoefficientPairs, 0);
169                gd.addNumericField("Reconstruction Points", ReconstructionPoints, 0);
170                gd.addCheckbox("Show Original Contour", ShowOriginalContour);
171                gd.addCheckbox("Show Full Reconstruction", ShowFullReconstruction);
172
173                gd.showDialog();
174                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
175                        return false;
176                
177                FourierCoefficientPairs = Math.max(1, (int) gd.getNextNumber());
178                ReconstructionPoints = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
179                ShowOriginalContour = gd.getNextBoolean();
180                ShowFullReconstruction = gd.getNextBoolean();
181                return true;
182        }
183        
184}
